game

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Rooms are collections of Layers and GameObjects. The class contains functions to add and remove objects, as well as switch the displayed room.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static Room displayedRoom 
      static java.util.List<Room> rooms
      A list of all the rooms created.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new room.

        public void addObject(GameObject object)

      • addLayer

        public int addLayer(Layer layer,
                    java.lang.String name)
        Adds a layer with the given name.
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer to add.
        name - The layer name. This will be used to reference the layer.
        Returns:
        The index of the added layer.

        index - The index of the layer to add it to.
        Returns:
